content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a restaurant by boat at approximately 9 30 pm eastern time in port st. lucie in martin county florida. i looked up about 1000 yards beyond the restaurant to see 4 lights flying and flashing irregularly. i asked my fellow witnesses what it was, thinking i had missed something, but nobody had an answer. i proceeded to film the ufos while a plane passed overhead. the plane does not show up on video. the lights continued to fly after i stopped filming for at least another 5 minutes before disappearing suddenly. i immediately assumed these were extraterrestrial crafts because of their flight pattern and their bright flashing lights. i was bewildered by these lights, as were 3 of my companions (there were children aboard too who saw it). there were flashes of light that could have been lightning coming from the west. however, there were hardly any clouds. i lost sight of the original lights while scanning the sky for whatever was causing the flashes to the east.
content.summary: Witnessed from boat. lights appeared and flew irregularly and flashed randomly. then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: All i want to say is , i saw many of these objects here in arizona , the orbs, where above the mountain tops to my right at about five miles away. they seemed to play hide and seek with me , as i drove my truck north on highway 87. they would appear and then hide behind the mountain tops , up and down and then move so fast in a north bound way . from the road , they looked about the size of a baseball, but they were five miles away, so i know they had to be at least the size of a house . i saw these many times as i drove the roads north on my run for safeway stores. i and a friend were sitting by a fire at horeshoe lake on the apache reservation in az. we sqat there just visiting , my wife hit the sack , and mary and i sat out side , it was a good fire and nice time talking, as i talked and i was staring at the waters edge , we were only five feet away from the edge of the lake . i looked over at mary , and she was staring up to my left at the dam . her mouth was open and she was just starimng up , so i looked up at what she was looking at , there over the lake and the dam at about maybe 7 or 8 hundred feet above the lake and about a half mile to my left was this ship ! it was at least one mile long or wide . it had about seven lights around it's edge . it was dark , but we could see the out line of that ship ,the night was moon lite and this ship coverd up much of the moon . it was large , no noiseor and sound of any kind , just a peaceful feeling i felt as i was watching this ship , we both don't know how ling we watched this ship , but we both felt a peaceful feeling . almost as if they said not to worry , they won't hurt us , they didn't speak , this is what i felt they said in my mind . i know this we will again be visited, i don't know how i know this , but it stands in my mind always . i have seen so much , now i just wanted to tell some one , i still talk to mary, and she don't want to talk about it . but like i said , i know they are here with us every day , and have been here ever since time began , this is something that puzzels me , how do i know this , i see it in my dreams at night many times . if you want to talk to me about this , i will talk , thank you
content.summary: Long and black

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were on the balcony having a cigarette and looking at the stars when i noticed to very bright stars side by side above the constellation hydra, they were as bright as venus is when its in our night sky. i know the night sky very well and knew that the only planet in view was jupiter and had never seen these stars before. 
so we're watching these two stars trying to figure out what they are when suddenly the two bright stars began to fade until they completely disappeared, then a few seconds later we both witnessed a sudden flash of light like a very bright star turning on and off but like a pulse just below where we saw the two lights, and my wife witnessed and another flash of light not far from the same location.
a few minutes later when trying to figure out what we saw, what looked like a bright satellite suddenly appeared above us and ran across the sky very quickly and disappearing as quick as it appeared.
ive observed plenty of satellite and meteorites in my life and have never seen anything like that.
content.summary: Two very bright stars spotted side by side above the constellation hydra, suddenly fade and a few seconds later two sperate flashes of light with a pulse effect were seen in the same area.

content.detailedDescription: I left work at 820 pm and was halfway home. i was heading south on 1000e just north of 56 th street. i was watching two jets far away probably landing at indpls airport. then to my right i saw what i thought to be a small plane coming toward me. that when it caught my attention because it had orange lights instead of red and green plus they were flashing really fast. i am still driving so it was hard to focus on it. by the time it got overhead i got my truck stopped and drivers window down. i stuck my head out and looked up at it and then it just went dark, lights out but with the full moon i could see it was round and it change direction. it was going ne and it instantly changed to south. i lost it after 3 to 4 seconds. before i noticed it i had just a weird feeling and remember looking at clock on dash to make sure i had not dozed or anything and i was right on time then i saw it. i am a little paranoid now. when i watched it go dark and change directions and not be seen makes you wonder how many more are there and what do they want.
content.summary: Orange very fast strobe light coming toward me, passed overhead lights went out on it then it changed direction instantly

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7pm on a week day earlier this year, late january or early february. i was making dinner when i received a call from my parents who were driving on their way home from work. they told me to come outside because the object they had witnessed flying a few weeks prior was back. i grabbed my camera phone and went outside in my front yard. as i got outside my parents arrived home and pointed out the object to me. it initially looked like normal plane or helicopter lights (red and white/yellowish). however i noticed the lights were not blinking and it was flying at a very low altitude and @ a high rate of speed with no sound emitted. the object was flying south, it then banked to the east, this is when the size of the object became apparent. at first i could only see the center portion of the object, but when it banked i could see the sides of it.  two massive rows of white lights were visible, one row coming of each side of the center of the object making a large v or boomerang shape. if i had to estimate the size of the object it was no smaller than one football field across. after the object changed flight to the east we lost sight of it. the whole sighting lasted only about 20 seconds, and as i stated earlier i thought it was an everyday craft at first so i had put my camera phone away, so unfortunately i didn't get a picture or video. i don't know what we saw that night but i am pretty sure it was not an ordinary commercial or private aircraft. my house is situated in the flight pattern of at least 5 airports, so i see a lot of air traffic.
content.summary: Very large flyng craft

content.detailedDescription: While sitting at the dinner table at 5:40pm with a view to the east above city objerved 2 pure white objects the size of a dime at arms length moving at fast pace one close behind the other like toying with each other at first they were visible and then they blanked out for a second then in view again before losing site as they moved behind trees and out of view.I can see why a person has a hard time seeing them. we are about 50 miles from of sac airbase so that must have a effect. other aircraft were approaching from the east at a high alitude after the sightning.They were in view 3 to 4 seconds.
content.summary: 2 objects traveling very fast moving south over city

content.detailedDescription:
After noting the convergance of 5 high flying jets,apperance of football form.Silver or seemingly irridecent form appeared for 1,2 seconds.Jets were above  50 thousand feet object was 3,4 thousand feet high.
it was a perfectly clear day,i was riding south bound on i275 near michigan ave.My wife was driving.Object appeard as if a tv screen suddenly went on than off in a instant. i had no real feelings, other than how others might react to my witnessing of event.
content.summary: Irridescent football form appeared after convergence of 5 high flying jets

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night me and my friend decided to sleep on the trampoline that night.I was about 11 yrs old at the time the date is very fuzzy because we never did report or write down the date...But looking back i believe it was about 1996 summer....We were both in our sleeping bags on our backs looking straight out into the sky when a ufo comes directly over top of us...It was big round and had orgy-red lights underneath it slowly rotating above us...It was soundless it shot off so fast not a sound came from it n i asked my friend did u just see what i did n his voice was scared and replied yes. suddenly it returned but lower this time my first instincts were to get out of there, as i freaked out to get my sleeping bag open there was a static show. from the trampoline and sleeping bag n ufo caused a serious static show it was going off like fire works lighting up if you've ever seen static at night its bright so imagine a bunch going off at once..I then ran off the trampoline inside the house. we told my friends mom but she did not believe a word us young kids were saying which i think prevented us from coming fwd with this at the time and report it.. we kept it a secret and it seemed me and my friend kind of forgot about it then one day it came back to me i asked my friend what he remembers and his story was a little bit different almost like his brain was trying to forget it. it bugs me that i don't have the exact date on this siting but i no what i seen was ufo and this is no made up story. i was feet from the ufo and it was straight above us so therefore looking right at us. i think if we feel alseep that night we would have been abducted no doubts specially after reading all these reports on here. i also wish we never ran into the house but i think that's just how us kids seen it. what really strikes me is the static that happen on the trampoline when we rushed out of there!
content.summary: Was scary crazy quick unreal!

content.detailedDescription: A group of my friends and i were at my friend's family's lake house in modoc, sc to celebrate her birthday.  we were all in 8th or 9th grade, but i don't remember exactly.  we were staying up late and nobody was drinking, by the way, all sitting on the dock outside.  we heard a loud sound towards the adjacent hill, and all focussed our attention there, wondering what it could be.  after about 30 seconds, we saw a large fireball that had intense directional thrust to the flames.  it slowly ascended, about a foot a second, all the while roaring like a jet.  even though this seems counter to logic, i remember the thrust of the flames pointing skyward as it rose (seems so backwards then and now).It was intensely bright and lit up the surrounding woods.  in all, it probably rose no more than 20 feet above the treetops and then simply disappeared, the sound and all.  this all took no more than 3 minutes.  everything was as before except we all sat in stunned silence for a few seconds.  i don't recall any of us speaking of it after that, which is a bit strange for teenage girls.
content.summary: Large fireball that roared like a jet and slowly ascended, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of chemtrails. this is something i do when they are spraying close to our home. when i put the pics on my pc, i saw something that looked like a helicopter in one of the pics. since i did not remember hearing a chopper while takin the photo, i decided to zoom in. as i did, i discovered that the "chopper" was actually a black colored bird, wings tucked in flight. what i had not seen until the pic was blown up, were 4 small, circular to oblong shaped, grey colored objects that appear to be flying in formation. two of them show light reflection, giving them a doom shaped appearance. i don't know what they were...But birds they are not.

if you zoom in on the attatched photo, you will see two birds in flight. behind the one that has the silhouette similar to a helicopter, you can see the 4 objects in the distance. they are in the upper right side of the photo.
content.summary: Found 4 objects in chemtrail photo i took

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in the vacinity of golden and battlefield streets by an apartment complet in springfield, mo. when i saw 6 yellow-orange orbs flying west to east. there was also a pulsating red light either on top or in the middle. i'm not good at judging distance but they were too far away to be able to see the craft.  they formed a v then ascended into the sky till they disappeared. 14 more orbs followed, randomly spaced out and followed the same flight path. someone else in the apartment complex saw them too. at one point, a plane flew at the same altitude but in the opposite direction. i've never seen a ufo before and i'm not sure what to make of it. i emailed a local news station and they said they heard on a traffic scanner someone reporting it to the police.
content.summary: I saw 20 yellow-orange orbs traveling west to east then ascend until they couldn't be seen anymore. there was no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't personally observe the object in question, but found it when i checked the photographs taken by a game camera that was set up to photograph predators that might be bothering our sheep.  sheep are in the photos and appear to be unaffected by the object, so assume there was no sound.  the infrared camera was attached to a tree at the side of the pasture about 2 1/2 feet off the ground and was stationary. it only took pictures when motion was detected and took numerous photos of sheep movement and other wildlife both day and night.  

i have included a photo progression of three photos (#16, #17, #18) taken one second apart, as well as one taken by the same camera in the same location in the daylight (#272) for perspective and one taken 18 seconds earlier (#15). the date and time are recorded at the bottom right of each photo.

photo #0015 - nothing in the sky in this photo.

photo #0016 - something dimly lit in the top right quadrant.  possibly approach of object in photo #0017.

photo #0017 - object in question is seen as a lighted rod with three triangles evenly spaced on top and four triangles evenly spaced on the bottom.  

photo #0018 - same as photo #1, taken one second after photo #3 shows nothing but dark sky.  

photo #0272 - photo taken in the daytime by same camera, which had not been moved, for perspective on where object was in comparison to the sky.  it appears that the lighted object in photo #0017 may have been in between the camera and the pine tree.
content.summary: Photos taken by infrared game camera of rod-shaped object with triangle-shaped appendages

content.detailedDescription: It scared me
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cross,   Diamond,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Scary

content.detailedDescription: Well i was playing on my ipad outside on my porch and talking to mom when i looked up and saw a blue light i ask mom what is that she said i don't know we'll it keep getting closer to us so i got video out on my phone and stared video tapping it it was bright blue in the the north sky and then moved so fast to the south sky and it keepped disappearing on and off then it moved slow below to the tree line and then shot back up in the sky and disappeared right before my eyes i have a perfect video of this and it was not anything man made i a sure you
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was bright blue at first and looked like star at first then got brighter and the it turned solid red and then turned white and moved really fast and then really slow

content.detailedDescription:
From a bedroom facing nw over sauble beach, lake huron, ontario canada, we noticed a big round white light up in the sky above the trees.  while we were wondering if it was a star or a planet, all of a sudden it started flashing or pulsating the light.  then it started going in circles, round & round in the same perfect circle for about 10 minutes each time.  it would disappear, then appear again in an other area of the sky, still facing nw or w.  this went on for about 1/2 an hour.  we don't know how long it had been in the sky before we noticed it.   we watched it from 3 nw facing rooms of our house.   too scared to go outside.

this happened on friday night between 10:10 p.M. & 11:10 p.M. march 29th, 2013.   i didn't know of this website until today, so would have reported it right away.
content.summary: Bright white stationary light.  then flashing.  the going in circles about 10 min. at at time in various areas. did not see maneuvers.  it just appeared in other areas going in circles.  could not see the craft, only the white lights.  hallf an hour.

content.detailedDescription: About a mounth ago we had a snow flerry all morning until about noon i was going to a friends house totake him car shopping just left my subdivision and notised one front pushing another front out with a clear sky area in between the sun was in the edge of the oncoming front covered by clouds and the sun rays were beautiful so i decited to try to take a pic i pulled my car over and snaped a shot then saw the objcoming through the clouds and snaped second shot the obj left tracks in the clouds i have pic on phone i was going to take more but my phone rang and it vanished before i could get back to pic it just disolved into thin air
content.summary: Was taking picture ofsun rays of sun behind clouds when it came striking through the clouds i cought it changing from yellow to orangenot 2 min from my home

content.detailedDescription: This afternoon i originally wanted to photograph the moon and was looking for the best focus, as i suddenly discovered nearby a fast-flying objects. i changed the direction of my camera and shot a few pictures successively. there were two different objects, one which flew from the top down, and 1 minute later, another object that flew from the bottom upwards. i photographed these objects from my window, in the apartment where i live in cologne. it happened in the east. while taking pictures i thought they were quite normal planes or jets, but then i saw something else in the photos. in the photos they look like flying double-or triple-rods, and do not look like us famous flying objects. in some of the photos you can see many small unidentified flying objects that accompanied the large ufo's. when i saw the result in the photos, i was very excited and decided to report my sighting.
content.summary: Unidentified flying objects - double or triple cigar shaped photographed over cologne on march 27, 2013 at 9 pm.

content.detailedDescription: My camcorder has run out of batteries, if someone reads this you need to look outside, it is mind blowing
content.summary: This is happening now west of tucson, it is massive!!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the freeway to work on saturday march 30, 2013 at about 8:40 pm in azusa ca, driving at normal speed i came around a turn i could see about a half a mile in front of me in full view many orange lights low in the sky just above the freeway. my first thought is that it was military and that it looked like an invasion or attack just because of the number of orange lights and how low there were. then i realized that this in no way could be military, there were no flashing red or blue lights that would distinguish one of our aircrafts. the orange lights seemed to be hovering or suspended in mid air but it seemed like they were all moving together at a slow crawling speed. what came to my mind then was the phoenix arizona lights in 1997. i had a feeling of fear and amazement i knew that what i was seeing was something amazing. it was so shocking and so incredible that all traffic on both sides of the freeway slowed down drastically (from about 70 mph to about 20 mph). i could tell everyone was looking at the lights trying to see what they were. i have never seen anything like this before and it's hard to explain exactly what i saw because there are no words to explain what exactly was in the sky. i would guess there was approximately 20 lights but possibly more. the lights took up a space of about 1/4 a mile long. at first i thought that each light was an individual aircraft, but the more i looked at the lights i realized that the lights all lined up perfectly and geometrically together, the angles each light were to one another was mathematically prefect, and they moved in unison together that it could mean that this possibly was one huge aircraft in the sky and not many small ones flying in a formation which is what i initially thought. it was flying too low for it to be any aircraft i have ever seen. if i could guess i would say the object/aircraft was about a building's length high in the sky maybe about 20 or 30 stories up from the ground. i have seen helicopters low but this was to big and moved too slow to be a helicopter. since this object/ aircraft was flying directly over the freeway, and the fact that traffic slowed down so much as we got closer to the object; i was able to look directly up at it from my windshield and i could not see any kind of shape or mass of an object/objects, all i saw was just orange lights suspended gracefully in the sky. so hypothetically if this was one huge craft it was possibly camouflaged with the nights sky. the only other aircraft lights i could see near by in the sky was lax traffic miles away in the horizon which is visible in azusa and the san gabriel valley. that is the only air traffic close by where planes would be flying low but azusa is too far from lax and the path the planes take to land at lax. i wish i would have taken a picture or video of these lights since it was so close to me and i was driving slow enough to capture it, but my phone camera was not working. so instead i called my boyfriend and was in hysterics telling him that i am seeing the most incredible thing in the sky but i can't tell what it was and i did my best in the moment explain to him what i was seeing. he was amazed and could tell i had just seen something not only amazing but indescribable. i have already found a video on youtube of another witness who saw what i saw, but they were a bit further from it. i have done research via the internet and have found that azusa is prone to ufo sightings. i have not contacted the city of azusa or the authorities about this event, but i might just to see if anyone else has reported the lights that i saw. i am a very open-minded but logical person, but this event is something i have never experienced before and it has really effected me. it has changed my perspective completely about ufo and ufo sightings, i don't think i could ever forget about it.
content.summary: Many orange lights over the freeway in azusa ca

content.detailedDescription: I had heard some strange sounds outside my grandmas house, and had gone out with my dad. when we saw these lights move across the sky very nice and calm. yellow and red. and was blinking slowly. my dad says their drones. but 5 of them and no nosie that close to the ground. i dont think so. it was lost some where over the tress and tall houses.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 lights moved across the sky. they came one after another/  didnt think they were lanterns. they were way to bright.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of march 29, 2013 from 10:35 am cdt until 10:39 cdt i observed two white cylindrically shaped objects fly from north to south, making a broad sweeping turn to the west. they stayed in view, ascending slightly until they finally just faded out.

the event was observed from my automobile as i was driving to work,  between kellyton, al, and goodwater, al on us highway 280, about 10 miles west of alexander city, al. i was able to keep the objects in view for four minutes. 

the day was clear, with scattered high cloud. i was driving in a northwesterly direction, and the objects appeared at my 2:00 position moving north to south. they were are very bright white, and were cylinder shaped. there were no wings or other control surfaces i could see.  they did not have the silhouette of rotary winged aircraft, appearing to be long and slender, rod like in their appearance. they were making a broad westerly turn, and ascending very slightly. 

their position to each other remained constant, one was slightly above and behind the other, as shown below:

                                                                                      _________________________

_________________________

i observed them almost continually for four minutes; i was driving and did have to be aware of road conditions. they finally just faded out, for lack of a better term at about my 10:00 position.

i grew up near and live fort benning, ga, and am familiar with most contemporary aircraft and helicopters. that���s not what these were. i also moved my head around as much as i could, to make sure they weren���t reflections in my car���s windshield. they weren���t.

they appeared to be close, i would say two miles or under, and were under 5000 feet  altitude. i have good vision, and as a result of my job i am a trained observer.

what struck me was the fairly slow speed, and brilliant whiteness of these objects, and the fact they faded away.
content.summary: Two cylindrical objects in formation moving n to s

content.detailedDescription: While checking out the clear view of the stars last night at approximately 10:00 pm (march 30, 2013) we witnessed an unknown, extremely large triangular shaped object with large lights on the bottom of it moving across the sky faster than any f-16, b-52 or passenger jet we've ever seen.  at first my husband thought it was a shooting star because of its speed, but immediately saw that it was indeed an aircraft with lights on two distinct sides.  we could determine it's size by the lights shining under the aircraft.  although the lights were much dimmer than the stars or a jet, they had a bluish hue that allowed us to see the outline of the aircraft which was definitely a triangle, not a formation of five aircraft.  there was no noise, and when a tree blocked our view and we ran to the end of the driveway to get a better view it was gone.  at the same time a passenger jet was traveling southeast to west.  the jet had its navigational lights on and was much, much lower, slower and much smaller than what we had just witnessed.
content.summary: We witnessed a very large triangular shaped object with five lights (no navigational lights) moving from south to north at speeds faster than any military or passanger jet that we know of - at least 100x faster than a jet.

content.detailedDescription: This took place on 3/8/13 around 7:07 stamped on the camera.I was looking at the clouds with my cannon rebel, them the most amazing event i ever witnessed with my own two eyes. i lock on a misty cloudy object , then all of a sudden it starts to evaporate or disappears and this this sphere type of object is there floating away from where the misty thing was. i did not see the sphere until a reveiw of the pics. i took about 15 -20 pics in a row. i have to say,the more i look the more there is.
content.summary: Mist or cloud that disappears then object appears and flies into cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: My wife saw the object not far from our home while driving to work shortly after 1pm. it looked like a bell, like nothing she'd ever seen.  the object was stationary and when it left it just vanished
content.summary: Bell shaped and vanished instantly

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished supper at our favorite restaurant at the corner of two major highways in town. i was standing outside waiting on my husband to come out and looked up into the sky. at first i thought it might have been a military formation because the two objects were very close in tandem with each other, they were less than a thousand yards apart going across the sky. i thought it was kind of a little too tight a formation for even a military one, and i know commercial jets would not be flying in such a tight formation. as my husband joined me, i asked him to look at the two objects because i thought it kind of unusual. right about then the rear of the two objects broke off the chase and made a sharp left hand turn away from the other object heading west. as we passed through town heading back toward our house the object had a sharp reversal and was headed back east. i did not see if the object went back to his chase.
content.summary: Two long dark objects emitting a jet like contrail

content.detailedDescription:
Reynoldsburg, oh march 30, 2013. my wife was in the back yard at approximately 10:10 pm est and called me to come see this. i saw 5 objects in the sky hovering at 2-5 miles away below the clouds. these 5 objects were dark in the center and had a red and white bright light outline. they were not in formation, but instead were moving back and forth in the same area. one would disappear and re-appear immediately on the other side of one that remained stationary (random leapfrogging). it seemed they were getting closer and then ascended and disappeared one by one. there was absolutely no noise. an airplane flew past the unknown cluster of 5 about a mile east going south as the 5 objects were ascending and disappearing. i assume the airplane was departing from cmh since we see airplanes taking off and landing from that area all the time. we were nervous and excited at the same time. our dogs were also nervous and were running back and forth and barking at nothing in particular. 
i saw the pictures in mufon case # 46507 and they are exactly like what we saw that night.
content.summary: 5 objects in sky hovering w/ random quick movement. white/red lights outlined dark object.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving up rt 55 in southern new jersey at 5:40 in the morning and looked up through my windshield and observed a blue light in the sky. at first i thought it was just just typical air traffic, but the light had no other lights nor were there blinking lights as usually associated with airplanes.  the light moved from an west to an east direction quickly, at a speed not typical of air traffic in the area.
content.summary: Blue light moved across the sky -quicker than most planes - no identifying lights

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the first thunderstorm of the year when we noticed a light that was moving between us and the storm. at first we thought that it was an airplane but then noticed that it was to low and moving in a non ballistic state. it would hover, then change color, then move again. we're not sure if it was a drone with a bright color changing light or if it was actually a u.F.O. but we've never witnessed any drones in the area.
content.summary: Watching thunderstorm when we saw a bright moving light changing color & direction..

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my driveway speaking on the phone around 10pm the night of march 30, 2013, when i happened to see something coming from east to west at a steady speed with a bright glowing red light that encompassed the entire object. after a few seconds, the light turned bright white. only a few seconds later, another object appeared the same way following the first, at which point i ended my conversation abruptly since i could not understand what i was seeing and started taking pictures with my camera phone. the two objects were then followed in quick succession by 3 more objects of the same nature. they would glow bright red, which would last a few seconds, and then turn bright white. there were no visible blinking lights as in an aircraft. i kept my hand as steady as possible taking the pictures. the objects made no sound whatsoever. thinking they may be planes or helicopters flying in formation, i kept listening for any sound as they seemed only a couple miles and were at the distance above the ground as a low flying plane,but i did not hear anything at all. i am outside at night alot observing the night sky, and we get plances and helicopters flying around all the time being able to see in the distance the flight path of planes coming into ft.Lauderdale intl airport or the local landing strip downtown ft.Lauderdale, but i have never witnessed anything like this and felt compelled to report it. the lights/objects flew in close formation, one in back of the other, heading west, and then just disappeared,just blinked out, when it seemed that the distance they were away from me, they should still have been visible. the entire event lasted about a minute. i was in awe as i observed the objects, waiting for the telltale signs of them just turning out to be airplanes or helicopters, like blinking lights, engine noise, the bright spotlight planes use when coming in, but i observed none of these. the objects did not make any abrupt turns or anything, but flew at a steady pace following eachother, intermittenly glowing red, and then disappeared. i felt very shaky and nervous after since i could not explain what it was, and shared the event with family members. i thought maybe the pictures i took could explain what it was and decided it was worth reporting. the pictures were taken with a 3.2 megapixel samsung camera phone, and if they can be blown up and made more decipherable and detailed, i would love to know what these objects were!
content.summary: Observed 5 red & white glowing discs traveling east to west at 10pm march 30 with clear skies traveling in succession then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I live on a hill overlooking lake norfolk in arkansas, the rear of my home faces south toward the lake norfolk dam. it was a cloudy, cold afternoon about 3:00 pm. i happened to be standing at my rear window looking out over the lake when from my left a brilliant crystal white ball of light raced south over lake norfolk toward the dam about 200 feet over the water.. it was lower than i was so i was looking a bit downward at it. it appeared to be about the size of a small bus or van, it was a brilliant crystal white. there is a row of trees that was between the object and me but there are no leaves at this time of year so i got a great look at it. it appeared to be rolling with flashing strobe lights, however it was passing behind the trees and i am not sure if it was actually flashing or the flashing was caused by the object passing behind the trees. as the object got south of me it slowed almost to a stop did a couple zigs and appeared to split into two or three small objects. it then continued slowly toward the dam and then disappeared. i never saw it rise above the tree line/horizon. the sighting did not last more than about 15 seconds.I had no other feelings than wow what was that. a few weeks later i saw a program on tv showing the stephenville lights and i realized that they were about the same thing that i saw.
content.summary: Same as stephenville lights
